LanguageData.VME_Mechanoids_Exalted.label: exalted
LanguageData.VME_Mechanoids_Exalted.description: To destroy a child of machination is a short-sighted and foolish act.
LanguageData.VME_Mechanoids_Despised.label: despised
LanguageData.VME_Mechanoids_Despised.description: Mechanoids are an abomination, a reminder of man's hubris.
